title: Duwiiton

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, write flavor text for any role. The flavor text must have a word count greater than the word count of the actual role. If any player has that role and you fulfilled the word count condition, you deal an attack to that player. 3 Uses.
- At night, get a hunch on a player's role. You learn 1 of 3 roles they could be. All roles shown in your hunch are present in this game.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The flavor text must relate to the role its about and must have capitalization and punctuation
- If user Duwiiton dies, you gain infinite charges of writing flavor text

desc:
Post 4538
*the flavor text is always longer than the role*
